text: "The Way I Are" is a song by American record producer Timbaland from his second album, Shock Value. The song was released on July 3, 2007. It features R&B; singer Keri Hilson. The song topped the charts in countries like Australia, Canada, the UK, Norway, and Denmark, while it reached the top three in the U.S. It managed to reach number one on the Billboard Mainstream Top 40/Pop Songs airplay chart. It has been certified triple-platinum in the U.S. for sales and shipments of over three million copies. At the end of 2007, the song ranked at number 18 on the Billboard Year-End Hot 100. ==Track listings== UK CD single # "The Way I Are" (featuring D.O.E., Keri Hilson and Sebastian) – 3:34 # "The Way I Are" (Timbaland vs. Nephew) (featuring D.O.E. and Keri Hilson) – 3:50 European enhanced maxi-single # "The Way I Are" (radio edit) (featuring Keri Hilson) – 3:19 # "Give It to Me" (Laugh at 'em) Remix (featuring Justin Timberlake and Jay-Z) – 3:20 # "The Way I Are" (Timbaland vs. Nephew) (featuring D.O.E. and Keri Hilson) – 3:50 # "The Way I Are" (video) French CD single # "The Way I Are" (French version) (featuring Tyssem) – 3:23 # "The Way I Are" (radio edit) (featuring Keri Hilson) – 3:19 Steve Aoki Pimpin Remix # "The Way I Are (Steve Aoki Pimpin Remix) – 4:11 == Certifications == ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Electro songs Category:Pop songs Category:2007 songs Category:Timbaland songs Category:Keri Hilson songs
title: The Way I Are
